```{r}
library(emphatic)
mtcars |>
  head(15) |>
  hl(
    palette     = ggplot2::scale_colour_viridis_c(),
    cols        = mpg,      # Where the colour scale is calculated
    scale_apply = mpg:disp, # Where the colour scale is applied
    show_legend = TRUE
  ) |>
  hl('hotpink', rows = hp == min(hp), cols = hp:carb)
```
